body.name: BLACK+DECKER One Step Steam Iron, EvenSteam Soleplate & Smart Steam Control with Easy-Fill Water Tank and 3-way Automatic Shutoff
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 1 min
features: EvenSteam Stainless Soleplate - Even steam distribution from tip to heel helps tame wrinkles anywhere on garments.
Smart Steam Control - The easy-read control automatically regulates and optimizes steam levels based on the temperature setting you select.
Spray Mist and Steam Burst Buttons - The side-by-side buttons offer total moisture control. One delivers a burst of steam and the other a gentle spray mist.
Easy-fill Water Tank - The water tank is designed for easy filling and features a large capacity.
Precision Point Soleplate - The pointed tip of the soleplate makes it easy to navigate around details.
body.description: From shirts and pants to curtains and drapes, ironing is simple with the BLACK+DECKER™ One Step Steam Iron. The new design* features the Even Steam Stainless Soleplate, which distributes steam more evenly from heel to tip for fast, effective ironing. With Smart Steam Controls, the iron automatically regulates and optimizes steam levels based on the temperature you select for different fabric types. The Precision Point Soleplate makes it simple to navigate around buttons, collars, and creases for crisp, detailed results. Other features include: easy-fill water tank, 3-way automatic shutoff, Auto Clean system, burst of steam, and vertical steam. A full suite of useful features makes BLACK+DECKER the trusted name in clothes irons.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a Dream Iron!!
reviews.reviewText: This iron is everything I could ask for, and I do a LOT of ironing! The only slight drawback is that I wish the cord was a couple inches longer, otherwise it's Terrific!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does the job BUT

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All you need in an iron

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Black & Decker Steam Iron
reviews.reviewText: Yes I know who uses an iron anymore? Well, I do occasionally, mostly for professional or formal wear. This iron is light weight and the controls are easy to see and to use. It does not have a Teflon faceplate but I’ve had no problems with sticking. The cord is nice and long and it heats up quickly. So…. So far I like it. It dose the job despite being so light. I like that Black and Decker has a replacement guarantee for their products. I will update if anything changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally... An Efficient, Effective, Easy-to-Use Steam Iron!
reviews.reviewText: I am a guy who likes to my clothes ironed, neat and orderly. For most of my adult life I have used many brands and types of iron. For the most part they are cumbersome, heavy and not quite as effective as I would like to get the wrinkles and fold marks out.Enter the Black+Decker EverSteam iron and it changes the situation. First of all, it is a lightweight, not in terms of performance but just in its weight. Plug it in and you will notice the red light on the top of the unit turn on indicating that it is plugged in and powered on. As you turn the fabric selector on the tip of the handle and set it to the type of fabric or material you need to iron, the red light will start flashing until the thermostat determines that the iron is at the correct temperature setting and the light will turn solid red.Before you start using the steam iron and also after you are done with your ironing, it would be a good idea to depress the Auto Clean button on the left side of the water reservoir. This helps clean out the steam vents and remove any water deposits, especially as you have used the steam iron for a while.The handle also has 2 large rectangular buttons, one for fine water spray on the left, and one for a burst of steam on the right. You put water into the iron's water reservoir through an opening right in front of the fabric selector. You open it by pushing the cover towards the right with your finger. The reservoir itself contains enough water to steam iron about several pairs of cotton pants before it needs to be refilled. Make sure that when you close the cover of the water reservoir back, that you hear the clicking sound of the cover to be sure that it is securely closed and sealed.Like any new steam iron, you might notice some water spots on the fabric from time to time. This is normal. As you keep on using the steam iron you should see less and less of this.So far I am impressed with the performance of this economical steam iron. It exceeded my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for college dorms
reviews.reviewText: BLACK+DECKER One Step Steam Iron, EvenSteam Soleplate & Smart Steam Control with Easy-Fill Water Tank and 3-way Automatic ShutoffThis is my sons first iron. He took it with him to his dorm and it is very easy to use. Fill with water, Set the clothing material and he is ready to go. So far he has no issues with using this iron.I like the automatic shufoff because he often forgets that the iron is still on and plugged in at home.Good first iron for the youngster.
